en: By the time Jesus arrived, Lazarus had been in the tomb four days.
Martha went out to meet him.

label.en: I Am the Resurrection and the Life

lines: in the resurrection at the last day.”
“I am the resurrection and the life.
He who believes in me will live,
and whoever lives and believes in me
I believe that you are the Christ,
who was to come into the world.”
It was a cave with a stone across the entrance.
He prayed aloud so that the people would believe
that the Father had sent him.
Then he called in a loud voice,
his hands and feet wrapped with linen.
“Take off the grave clothes and let him go.”

question.en: Jesus said, 'I am the resurrection and the life.' What do you think this means? Why did he ask Martha, 'Do you believe this?'
